@graph.text: How do you like you roast beef?

headline: Perfect Roast Beef
name: Perfect Roast Beef
recipeInstructions: Recommended: let roast sit uncovered at room temperature for 1 to 2 hours. Preheat oven to 450°. In a small bowl, combine oil, garlic, rosemary, thyme, salt, and pepper. Rub all over roast. Place roast in roasting pan fitted with a roasting rack. Roast for 15 minutes, then reduce heat to 325° and roast 1 hours 45 minutes more for medium, or 2 hours for medium well done. Remove from oven and let rest 15 to 30 minutes before serving.

video.name: This Roast Beef Will Wow Your Dinner Guests

review.reviewBody:
I was a little nervous about this roast because I don't do it very often. However this recipe is perfect!
I bought a 3.5 lb bottom round roast. I didn't have any fresh herbs except rosemary, so chopped that with garlic, pepper, and olive oil,  and rubbed the roast with it on all sides. I let it come up to room temperature while I did other things.
I put it in the 450 f. with convection on, oven for 15 minutes,  reduced the temperature to 325 f (without convection) and roasted for about 1 hour 10 minutes, taking it out of the oven when internal temperature reached 127 f.
The roast rested, covered with foil,  while I got the rest of the meal together.
When I sliced it, I was Amazed! The roast was a beautiful shade of pink all the way through,  from end to end, not medium well or well done anywhere! I thought sure the center would be almost raw (if the end was pink), but no, it was perfectly pink all the way through! How does that even happen! The meat was on the lean side, and still perfectly tender.
I just had to write and tell you how great this recipe is. I've lost my fear of roasting meat, and will always follow this recipe!!

I made this last night for valentines dinner... with mashed sweet potatoes and roasted almond green beans.. it was one of the best meals I have even made.. ever! I highly recommend this roast recipe! I used a 2.5 lb round roast and cut the 325 cook temp time down to an hour and a half.. it came out PERFECT!

I’m not sure anyone answered so I will now.  Do not cover the roast while cooking.  I am a self taught old school cook.  Roasts were always hit or miss with me until this recipe.  It is perfection.  Thank you so much for breaking this recipe down.

Absolutely the BEST and EASIEST Recipe!!!  I tried making Roast Beef numerous times with not luck!  I either over cooked it or it was way too rare!!  So this time I went online and found this recipe.  I thought it can’t be this easy!!  But it absolutely was and it was so delicious!!!  My finicky Teenagers were even impressed!!  Thank you so much for this Recipe!!
2nd time making this roast , new house wife now , and feel like I’m nailing it , learning new recipes and learning to cook. Absolutely Delicious !
Tried today. Yummy! The gravy made from the drippings was fantastic!

I'm in my 50s and this is the first time I've ever made roast.  Followed the recipe exactly and it turned into the best roast I have ever tasted.  What to do with the leftovers?  I guess we'll never know as there were none!
Made this today and it was delicious. My husband and sister like their beef well done and I like a little pink. The seasoning was PERFECT. This will become a regular dish at our home.

I was nervous about doing a roast as I didn’t want to over cook it.   
I bought a small roast, 2.5lbs.  Did the 15 mins at 400 and 1 hour at 325.  
It was PERFECT!  
My husband and son said it was the best they’d ever had.

I used this recipe for a 4lb roast. It was good. A few lessons learned / pointers:
I seared it beforehand in a cast iron instead of raising the temperature in the oven ahead of the long roasting. However, after searing it did not require 1hr 40 minutes, but much less. Probably next time, I will check the temperature and leave it in the oven for around I hour and 20 - 30 minutes
Delicious,  I found thus recipe and made this Roast Beef for Dinner. My family  LOVED Thank you.

I made this yesterday with a 2 lb sirloin roast and it cooked wayyyy too quickly for my tastes! I think my oven runs a little hot; and with such a small roast is a challenge. I did it on 450 for 15 mins then 325 for 35 mins and internal temp was already up to 180F! I like medium rare so that was not ideal. However the recipe and rub are amazing! Just make sure to consider your own oven and the shape of your roast (mine was quite wide and thinner) ... I knew it would be quick but no idea that quick!

description: Roast beef﻿﻿ might sound fancy and complicated to make, but it's actually quite simple! With a good piece of meat and some simple herbs, you can have roast beef that's way more tender and flavorful than the store-bought kind. Below, we break down what's most important to know when preparing this classic dish.
keywords: roast beef, roast beef recipe, how to cook roast beef, perfect roast beef, how to make roast beef, simple roast beef, easy roast beef recipe, holiday recipe, paleo beef recipe, holiday roast beef, herb roast beef, thyme roast beef, rosemary roast beef, beef roast in the oven
